tool.name: Stop Codon Statistics
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool processes a **DNA multi-FASTA file** containing feature sequences. For each sequence in your FASTA file the tool extracts the stop codon, then it calculates the codon distribution.
**Example Output**
# Name Codon Count Ochre TAA 155 Amber TAG 10 Opal TGA 111
